Strawberry Negroni

Print Recipe ⚡

Strawberry is the perfect complement to the classic Negroni profile. Bitter orange and citrus, along with the spice of sweet vermouth add layers of complexity. This cocktail is a stunner and is a must-try-- you will not be disappointed!

Ingredients:

  • ½ oz Pacific Strawberry Syrup
  • 1 oz gin
  • ¾ oz Campari
  • ½ oz vermouth

Instructions:

  • Add all ingredients to a mixing glass
  • Add ice and stir for 10 seconds
  • Strain into a rocks glass over a large format ice cube

Glass:

  • rocks

Garnish:

  • strawberry
